font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. 急切而不清楚地说： to speak hastily and incoherently, as when confused or angry
【例】 They begin to splutter and move restlessly about if they feel time is slipping away without some return.当他们感到时间在悄悄流逝却一无所得时，他们便开始激动地说话，不安地走动。
【近】 babble, drivel, gabble, gibber, jabber, sputter, stammer, stutter
【反】 articulate, enunciate, pronounce 清楚地说
